doc.title: New Jersey: The Movie
doc.plot: Follow Steve Chernoski, as he visits New Jersey's wonderful towns, interviews colorful residents (including many mayors) and gets in the middle of town festivals and high traffic areas polling people on the often asked question: Where is the cultural dividing line between North and South Jersey? From Rodeos to Minor League Ballparks, From Boardwalks to Speedways, From Cape May to High Point, see the real New Jersey in "New Jersey: A Barrel Tapped at Both Ends."
